google_search.title: 2025 Streetwear Forecast: Oversized & Acid Wash
google_search.description: The resurgence of 90s grunge is hitting hard. Expect heavy acid wash denim, boxy tees, and distressed fabrics.

google_search.title: Techwear Evolution: Function meets Dystopia
google_search.description: Utility vests, excessive straps, and waterproof matte fabrics are defining the new urban ninja look.

google_search.title: Sustainable Earth Tones: The 'Gorpcore' Shift
google_search.description: Muted greens, browns, and beiges derived from natural dyes. Outdoor gear aesthetics entering casual wear.

google_search.title: Neo-Psychedelia: Liquid Chrome & Neon
google_search.description: Digital art influence is huge. Liquid metal textures combined with neon gradients.

google_search.title: Maximalist Typography: Bold Statements
google_search.description: Fonts are getting bigger, bolder, and distorted. Readable text is secondary to visual impact.

pinterest.title: Cyber Y2K Aesthetics
pinterest.description: Futuristic 2000s vibes. Metallic puffers, wraparound shades, and star graphics.

pinterest.title: Abstract Line Art Faces
pinterest.description: Minimalist continuous line drawings of faces and figures on neutral tees.

pinterest.title: Retro Anime Vaporwave
pinterest.description: 80s anime stills mixed with glitch art and kanji characters. Pink and teal palette.

pinterest.title: Botanical Dark Academia
pinterest.description: Detailed scientific illustrations of mushrooms and ferns on dark fabrics.

pinterest.title: Spray Paint Stencil Art
pinterest.description: Banksy-style stencil graphics. Raw, rebellious, and textured.

instagram.title: #OOTD: Layering Masterclass
instagram.description: Influencers are mixing hoodies under flannels under denim jackets. Texture overload.

instagram.title: #Sneakerhead Matching Fit
instagram.description: Perfect color coordination between Jordans and graphic tees. Red and Black dominance.

instagram.title: #VintageTee Grail
instagram.description: Washed out black tees with cracked prints of 90s rock bands. The 'lived-in' look.

instagram.title: #MonochromeFit Studio
instagram.description: All white everything. Playing with fabric weight and opacity instead of color.

instagram.title: #CyberPunk Fashion Week
instagram.description: Neon LED accessories and reflective materials caught in flash photography.
